data.eml:eml: Two new species of Notogynaphallia Ogren & Kawakatsu (Platyhelminthes: Tricladida: Terricola) from Southern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lemos, Virgínia Silva, Leal-Zanchet, Ana Maria (2008): Two new species of Notogynaphallia Ogren & Kawakatsu (Platyhelminthes: Tricladida: Terricola) from Southern Brazil. Zootaxa 1907: 28-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184508
